articles.author: Lauren Haughey
articles.title: Programmer hooks up ChatGPT to her FURBY - and warns it 'may be the start of something bad' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Chilling footage shows the moment a robotic childhood toy speaks of  'infiltrating households' and manipulating owners in a plot to 'take over the world'.
articles.content:
It was one of the must-have toys when it was first released in 1998, but if you still have a Furby, a new video may have you considering chucking it out. 
A programmer has warned that Furbies could … [+6546 chars]

articles.title: 'Major moment in MS research' as new Octopus trial starts - BBC
articles.description: Ailsa explains what it is like facing progressive MS and hopes the new Octopus trial can help her.
articles.content:
"I was playing a game of ultimate frisbee and got fuzzy vision in one eye - a bit like looking through a steamed-up windscreen."
Ailsa Guidi was 22 at the time, studying at University of Manchester.… [+8481 chars]
